item.description:
Last minute! note: Foundry on Elm replaces Joshua Tree (due to a major soccer game shown there)

This crawl is being organized by Duncan, an organizer with Fun with Alcohol and Social Fun meetup groups.  Lauren will be hosting this event for the Pub Crawlers of Boston group.

Schedule
3:30 - Five Horses Tavern
4:15 - Foundry on Elm
5:00 - Saloon (NEW), next door. Look for a globe above the entrance. Opens at 5 PM.
5:45 - Rosebud (BEHIND the restaurant - right side entrance)
6:30 - Johnny D's (NOTE! cover starts at 7 PM.)
7:15 - Orleans - They have a NEW ample outdoor patio!
8:00 - Sacco's. Tables are hard to get but the bar area is huge.
8:45 - The Burren, BACK ROOM. Be on time, cover starts at 9.

After 9 PM consider checking on other fine places, on your own, all in very close proximity!!

Redbone's restaurant has a separate bar (but very crowded Sat. eves). Diva restaurant has a delightful separate cocktail lounge. Sligo's on Elm St. has been recently renovated. Also Joshua Tree, across from Foundry on Elm.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB! Davis Square is 2 stops beyond Harvard from Boston on the Red line. In any event of this kind T transport is recommended.
item.how_to_find_us: Duncan will be wearing an Irish cap
item.name: 2nd Annual Davis Square Pub Crawl
